seller_description: Pedigree Wet Dog Food for Puppies (Chicken & Liver Chunks in Gravy) is a 100% complete and balanced meal made with real meat and high-quality protein, offering a delicious, gravylicious flavor that puppies love. The quality ingredients ensure your puppy stays healthy and energetic, while the high moisture content helps keep them hydrated. This nutritious food supports strong muscles and bones with protein and calcium, promotes brain and vision development with DHA, and boosts natural defense with Vitamin E and Selenium. Available in a convenient bag, it's the perfect meal for growing puppies.
